title.narrative: The joint executive program of the project to operate a dialysis center in Al-Dhalea Governorate in the Republic of Yemen - Phase III

description.narrative: It is a project based on providing free renal dialysis services for patients with acute and chronic renal failure to the residents of Al-Dhalea governorate in Yemen, in addition to providing meals to patients during dialysis treatment (each patient performs 13 monthly dialysis sessions for free), and the patient also receives health care before An internal consultant specializing in nephrology is free of charge, in addition to conducting the relevant examinations

Providing hemodialysis service in accordance with health standards and settling the service to alleviate the suffering of patients with renal failure and support the resilience of the health sector in Al-Dhalea Governorate, Republic of Yemen. Sub-goals: Reducing the suffering of renal failure patients / saving and preserving their lives by performing a hemodialysis process for them / improving performance in the center through the consulting clinic / enumerating patients and following them up through the database
